body: <u></u>Hello Everyone,My name Is ItsJakeFTW and i need very important help with my fraps! For a while ive been playing Minecraft in half-screen because it gives me better fps and just helps me in pvp.So i got Fraps but when i record the videos ARE NOT in 720p and are very blurry im very confused.
body_tagged: <u></u>Hello Everyone,My name Is ItsJakeFTW and i need very important help with my fraps! For a while ive been playing Minecraft in half-screen because it gives me better fps and just helps me in pvp.So i got Fraps but when i record the videos ARE NOT in 720p and are very blurry im very confused.
title: Fraps Help! ASAP

replies.body: Have you tried viewing the video at the same size (resolution) of Minecraft at the time of the recording?
replies.body_tagged: Have you tried viewing the video at the same size (resolution) of Minecraft at the time of the recording?

replies.body: Fraps can just record at the resolution you're playing on, if you want to record at a different resolution that you play on, I'd recommend buying dxtory.
replies.body_tagged: Fraps can just record at the resolution you're playing on, if you want to record at a different resolution that you play on, I'd recommend buying dxtory.

replies.body: I need help with that,resolution is what I suspected the problem to be.Its like I edit my resolution I just click the half screen and play like that.So what's the resolution for half screen?how do I put it in fraps?

replies.body:
If you have it set to "Half-Size" then yes it's going to be terrible

However, Half-Size is good when you record at 1080p + but at 720p just set it at Full-Size if not already.
replies.body_tagged:
If you have it set to "Half-Size" then yes it's going to be terrible

However, Half-Size is good when you record at 1080p + but at 720p just set it at Full-Size if not already.
